article:
'Platform' is an interdisciplinary British art group that creates projects with
social justice and environmental justice themes. A 1992 project by Platform
sparked a local campaign to dig up the River Effra in London, England.

Their ongoing research into the political economy of oil is called the
Unraveling the Carbon Web.

In 2006, with funding from Arts Council England they produced And While London
Burns, an operatic audio tour of the City of london.
